short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds 'First', 'Previous', 'Next' and 'Last' buttons to Escapist Magazine's Critical Mix comic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As of now, Critical Mix doesn't have navigation buttons. The Escapist's developers have a lot on their plate with the site redesign, so here's an extension that adds 'First', 'Previous', 'Next' and 'Last' buttons, in the same visual style as the rest of the site.

(Extension icon made by Becris from www.flaticon.com, and licensed under Creative Commons 3.0 BY)
